title: Fourier-Motzkin elimination extension to integer programming problems
abstract: This paper describes how the Fourier-Motzkin Elimination Method, which can be used for solving Linear Programming Problems, can be extended to deal with Integer Programming Problems. The extension derives from a known decision procedure for the formal theory of a fragment of arithmetic which excludes multiplication
